description: Find places to park your cycle at stations, on and off streets and near your home across London.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Find places to park your cycle at stations, on and off streets and near your home across London."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
There are over 20,000 cycle parking spaces at stations across London. Many free spaces are near the entrance or in our station car parks.
You can also use Cycle Hubs which provide secure and covered spaces near stations:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"https://cyclehoop.force.com/RentalsCommunity/yourcycleparking?id=a0h0O00002Yz1bIQAR\"\u003eEnfield Town and Edmonton Green\u003c/a\u003e (Enfield)"," \u003ca href=\"https://cyclehoop.force.com/RentalsCommunity/yourcycleparking?id=a0h0O00002OCDo8QAH\"\u003eFinsbury Park\u003c/a\u003e (Islington)"," \u003ca href=\"https://www.heathrow.com/transport-and-directions/cycling\"\u003eHeathrow\u003c/a\u003e (Hillingdon)"," \u003ca href=\"https://www.enjoywalthamforest.co.uk/cycle-parking/cyclehubs/\"\u003eWaltham Forest\u003c/a\u003e (Walthamstow Central, Walthamstow, Leytonstone, Wood Street, St James Street and Leyton)"]}
There's also cycle parking at National Rail stations .
There are almost 150,000 on-street cycle parking spaces across London (data from CycleStreets).
Some councils in London provide secure cycle parking in their car parks. This includes the City of London who have free, 24-hour cycle parking in five car parks across central London .
You can use a cycle hangar - a safe, covered place to park your cycle. There are over 7,200 spaces across 25 London boroughs.
If you'd like a cycle hangar near your home, you can apply for one through your local council.

{"template":"image","link":{"image":{}},"image":{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/bike-hangar-web-image.jpg","alt":"Woman putting her bike into a Cyclehangar on a residential street."},"wrapped":false}
To keep your cycle safe , you should register it with BikeRegister or Immobilise .
If your cycle is stolen, you need to report a cycle crime .

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"/modes/cycling/santander-cycles/find-a-docking-station\"\u003eSantander Cycle docking stations\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"http://content.tfl.gov.uk/cycle-parking-implementation-plan.pdf\"\u003eCycle Parking Implementation Plan\u003c/a\u003e (.PDF)"]}
